column1: hlobohang manyeo hle ake ubue hle
bapalang keutlwe he lebapala lele bang
aphehuwe ke mang makwenya ao a lona
utlonjwetsa hore na utswadireka khefing ya mang
kobo ena uebehe beteng ena yahao
hei ukabetsetsa kumbakumba ya moratuwa wahao lekhaleng
ee ke ya mang we ntate
he bapalama potsotso le kombi bana baa
ha ureke fanta ke eng unwe
ha ure e mme ke eng
oo ausi mami ke mme mami yadutseng kobong yahae
